dakarakkhasapañha：dakarakkhasapañha（ti）
ဒကရက္ခသပဉှ（တိ）
[dakarakkhasa+pañha]
[ဒကရက္ခသ+ပဉှ]

Dakarakkhasapañha：At the suggestion of Mahosadha the ascetic Bherī asks King Cūlanī what he would do if he were voyaging on the ocean with his mother，wife，brother，friend，chaplain，and Mahosadha，and a water-demon，seeking human sacrifice，were to seize the ship．

The king answered that he would sacrifice all but the last，in the order given，and then himself，but that Mahosadha should not be sacrificed．Bherī persuaded the king to make this declaration in public，so that Mahosadha’s glory might be spread far and wide．J.vi.469ff.，477，478.

dakarakkhasapañha：ဒကရက္ခသပဉှ（တိ）
[ဒကရက္ခသ+ပဉှ]
ဒကရက္ခိုသ်နှင့်စပ်သော- အမေး-ပုစ္ဆာ-ပြဿနာ-သိလိုသောအနက်သဘော၊ ဒကရက္ခိုသ်ကို ဥပမာဆောင်၍ မေးမြန်းအပ်သော အမေး-ပုစ္ဆာ-ပြဿနာ-သိလိုသောအနက်သဘော။
